title: Rasen Mechanic with Misread Rasen Mechanic

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Short circuit a player each night. (Short circuited players' attributes are nullified until the end of the night.)
- **Thwarp** during the day. (Thwarping roleblocks all players. Can only be used once. Roles which kill roleblockers, such as Serial Killer, will unstoppably kill you the next night if you Thwarp.)
